questions.question: According to the Constitution of Nepal 2072, how many fundamental rights are guaranteed to Nepali citizens?
questions.explanation: The Constitution of Nepal 2072 guarantees 31 fundamental rights to Nepali citizens under Article 16-46.

questions.question: Which is the highest peak in Nepal?
questions.explanation: Mount Everest (Sagarmatha) is the highest peak in Nepal and the world, standing at 8,848.86 meters above sea level.
